name: Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk eggs and milk together.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.

name: Scrambled Eggs
steps: Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk with salt.
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Pour in the eggs and stir gently until cooked to your liking.

name: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice and salt.
Spread the avocado mixture on the toasted bread.
